definition: sound of sighing/(interjection expressing surprise, sorrow, regret, disappointment etc) oh/damn/wow
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°
"Beijing cough", respiratory problems caused by dry and polluted Beijing air, typically experienced by non-acclimated foreigners who would otherwise have no such problems

sentences.english: Is the phlegm thin and white?
sentences.chinese: 他咳吐的痰是稀白的麼？

sentences.english: She cough to give him the hint that he shall go.
sentences.chinese: 她咳了一聲，向他暗示他該走了。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Orange-red cough particles has significant anti-inflammatory effects.
sentences.chinese: 結論橘紅痰咳顆粒具有明顯抗炎作用。

sentences.english: She gave a little cough to catch my attention.
sentences.chinese: 她輕輕地咳了一聲以引起我的注意。

sentences.english: Don't cough more than you can help.
sentences.chinese: 不要比你能忍的咳的更多。

sentences.english: I have a persistent cough. I cough up a lot of phlegm(thick spit)on most days.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地在咳，多半時間咳出濃濃的痰。

sentences.english: It is very uncommon to cough up cancer, but she did it.
sentences.chinese: 把癌症咳出來非常罕見，但是她做到了。

sentences.english: The tissue which she coughed up was tested and there was a malignancy.
sentences.chinese: 她的咳出物經檢測是惡性的。

sentences.english: Have you ever coughed up blood or bloody phlegm?
sentences.chinese: 你曾咳出血或痰中帶血嗎？

sentences.english: He prefaced his talk with some coughs.
sentences.chinese: 他先咳了幾聲纔開始談話。

sentences.english: Blue Joe lightly coughed a voice again, don't want that seeing plum is handsome entangled.
sentences.chinese: 藍喬又輕輕咳了聲，不想看到李子俊的難堪。

sentences.english: She gave a quiet cough to attract our attention.
sentences.chinese: 她輕咳一聲以引起我們的注意。

sentences.english: He coughed in order to clear his throat.
sentences.chinese: 他咳了一聲，清了清嗓子。

sentences.english: Early disease have a dry cough, and changed to wet cough, shortness of breath.
sentences.chinese: 病初有乾咳，後轉爲溼咳，呼吸困難。

sentences.english: Um…well, talk about connections, are those all beef dogs?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，咳，說到門路廣，那門熱狗是純牛肉的嗎？

sentences.english: If this happens, it can become very difficult to cough up phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 如果發生這種情況，它可以成爲很困難的痰咳起來。

definition: to give a hollow laugh/to force a smile/forced laugh/CL:聲|声[sheng1]
(interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
oh (expression of agreement or surprise)/(Cantonese) not
